Play:
The Yaguchi Ferry
(Shinrei Yaguchi no watashi / 神霊矢口渡)

Written By: Fukuuchi Kigai (福内鬼外)

First Staged: 1770

Reference: Hironaga, Shūzaburō, The Bunraku Handbook (Tokyo: Maison des Arts, 1976); Bunraku May 1975 Performance Program

– Click image to view.

Performances:

May 1975: The Yaguchi Ferry

July 1986: The Yaguchi Ferry

September 1995: The Yaguchi Ferry

Characters:

Tsukuba-Gozen (Tsukuba Gozen / 筑波御前)

Tokujumaru's wet nurse (Tokujumaru no uba / 徳寿丸の乳母 )

Minato (Tsuma Minato / 妻湊 )

Tomochiyo's wet nurse (Tomochiyo no Uba / 友千代の乳母)

Rokuro (Minase Rokurō Munezumi / 南瀬六郎宗澄)

Hyogonosuke (Yura Hyogonosuke Nobutada / 由良兵庫助信忠 )

Hachiro (Shinozuka Hachirō Shigetora / 篠塚八郎重虎)

Takezawa (Takezawa Kenmotsu Hidetoki / 竹沢監物秀時)

Onabe, a maid (Onabe / 腰元お鍋)

Omatsu, a maid (Koshimoto Omatsu / 腰元お松)

Eda (Etano Hangan Kagetsura / 江田判官景連)

Chief constable (Torite gashira / 捕手頭)

Chozo (Umakata negoto no Chōzō / 馬方寝言の長蔵 )

Yoshimine (Nitta Kotarō Yoshimine / 新田小太郎義岑)

Utena (Keisei Utena / 傾城臺)

Ofune (Musume Ofune / 娘お舟)

Rokuzo (Genan Rokuzō / 下男六蔵)

Sorobei (Shikkari Sorobei / しっかり候兵衛 )

Juji (Sangami Jūji / 三上十次)

Pinsuke (Karano Pinsuke / からのぴん助 )

Tonbei (Watashinomori Tonbei / 渡し守頓兵衛)

Hachisuke (Hiyō no Hachisuke / 日傭の八助)

Tokujumaru (Tokujumaru / 徳寿丸)

Tomochiyo (Tomochiyo / 友千代)
